title: Fair play
creator_credit: Susan Lambert, Janet Bell and Film Australia
brief_description: Australian women cricketers are the undisputed world-cup cricket champions in a sport which is hotly contested by nine affiliated countries. This film follows their latest tour to England to play on the hallowed grounds at Lords.
creator_credit_for_label: Susan Lambert, Janet Bell and Film Australia
